Package bio.singa.structure.model.oak

Class LeafSubstructureFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.structure.model.oak.LeafSubstructureFactory
  • public class LeafSubstructureFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The residue factory is used to create residues from a set of AtomFilter with their AtomNames. This also connects the atoms in the residues, where possible. No distance criterion is used but the knowledge of the residues and the usually connected atoms. Different options can be set.
